articles.title: Windows president says platform is "evolving into an agentic OS," gets cooked in the replies — "Straight up, nobody wants this" - Windows Central
articles.description: Microsoft's current Windows lead Pavan Davuluri has tweeted that the future of Windows will be one that evolves into an agentic OS, but has received significant pushback online.
